channel.title: Coding a shop!
channel.description:
well yesterday i was coding my 525 shops
so... i was adding some stuff to a shop and then i had a error and like 8 players where waiting so i had to copy and paste shop file with another severs so now it doesn't have donar shop and i want to add it.
how do i make a npc sell item please respond quick.i really need help i wana finish coding it. today.
